name: places/ChIJsd-MEQtZwokRVH7CuP8FLzo
adrFormatAddress: 381 1st Ave., New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
Sigfrido's is the best, and Ruben is excellent. He is a tremendous barber. My father even waits until he visits New York so that he can get his hair cut at Sigfrido's. He is quick and efficient, the price is right and, most important of all, I leave looking great every single time. He knows what I want and gets it right every visit.

The best part, though, is the straight razor shave which, for less than $30 before tip, is the best affordable luxury in NYC. You leave looking and feeling great -- like you could walk on air. I did not know that it could be so relaxing to have a razor up against your neck, but such is Ruben's power.

If you want to book your haircut six months in advance from an Instagram ad and pay $400 for it with an American Express card, you can do that elsewhere in Manhattan. But if you want a consistently great haircut and shave from a real pro with no fuss and Sinatra on the radio, Ruben's your guy.

originalText.text: My favorite barber in LES! I moved here a few months ago and Ruben has been clearly the best barber I have seen, both in quality of hair and overall experience. Ruben is extremely kind and friendly and cares about his customers and their lives. The price is extremely fair and I have never had to wait longer than about 15 minutes! I would 100% recommend Sigfrido’s and I am now a regular!

text.text: My favorite barber in LES! I moved here a few months ago and Ruben has been clearly the best barber I have seen, both in quality of hair and overall experience. originalText.text: Well priced and readily available, Ruben is one of the best barber's I've ever had in my life! On top of this, I genuinely believe he is one of the hardest working people in the entire city of NYC. Sigfrido's is always open, and Ruben is always moving through clients at an incredible rate to make sure you're never waiting too long. That said, even if things are busy - Ruben makes sure he provides the time deserved to every person who walks through the door.

originalText.text: BEST SKIN FADE IN NY! Went to a few barber shops before finding Sigfrido’s. Ruben consistently gives me great cuts and was able to fix my hair when another barber messed it up.

text.text: BEST SKIN FADE IN NY! Went to a few barber shops before finding Sigfrido’s. Ruben consistently gives me great cuts and was able to fix my hair when another barber messed it up.

originalText.text: Ruben at Sigfrido’s is the best barber in town! He is super friendly and attentive. Prices are affordable for men and the haircuts take less than 20 minutes. Walk-ins encouraged but you can call ahead to make sure he saves you a spot. Highly recommend this place as I have been going here on a consistent basis for years!
